### Guide

# Overview

## Comprehensive guide to the platform

This guide covers all the essential concepts and patterns you need to know to build great documentation sites.

Whether you're building a simple project documentation or a complex API reference, this guide will help you understand the architecture and best practices.

### Topics covered

- Content authoring with Markdown
- Component customization
- Navigation and routing
- Deployment and hosting

### Who is this for?

This guide is designed for developers and technical writers who want to create professional documentation sites. Basic knowledge of Markdown and web development is helpful but not required.

Start with [Content Authoring](page:content) to learn the basics.
